elements.text: Are you currently receiving any help for issues related to mental health? Please select all that apply, or "I am not receiving help".

buttons: Therapy::Therapy (talking with a trained professional)nnExamples: Psychologist, licensed mental health practitioner (LMHC), school counselor, social worker, marriage and family therapist, group therapist
Prescription:: Prescription medicationsnnExamples: Psychiatrist, medical doctor
Social::Seeking other social support (talking with non-professionals)nnExamples: Teacher, family member, friend, religious leader, coach
SelfHelp::Self-guided helpnnExamples: Self-help book, blogs, online intervention (other than MindTrails-Movement), mobile applications
elements.name: help
